channel.title: OpenGL Image (GLI) - Releases
channel.description: Get the updates when new version of GLI are released

item.title: GLI 0.8.1.1 released
item.description: Updated GLI to GLM 0.9.8.0 release, build fixes.

item.title: GLI 0.8.1.0 released
item.description: Improved copy and sub copy, support of npot compressed texture, various performance optimizations, various DDS loader fixes, improved luminance alpha translation with OpenGL core, etc...
